item.title: Kittur Rani Channamma’s birth anniversary celebrated in Raichur, Yadgir
item.description:
<![CDATA[Kittur Rani Channamma’s birth anniversary was celebrated in Raichur and Yadgir districts on Thursday with enthusiasm.
Minister for Minor Irrigation N.S. Boseraju inaugurated the celebrations with a floral tribute to the great freedom fighter and also, garlanding the Basaveshwara statue at Basaveshwar Circle in Raichur.
Rani Channamma’s portrait was brought to Siddarama Jambaladinni Rangamandir in a grand procession.
Additional Superintendent of Police Kumarswamy said that Rani Channamma brave...]]>
